They removed the %current health damage from her traps which I would assume would lower her damage done to monsters by a pretty decent amount.   The increased AP ratio on Swipe wouldn't compensate in terms of early clear times which really are the clear times that matter most.

What I gather is that Riot doesn't have a problem with her jungling (in which case reverting the ability to mark monsters for Prowl would have been the way to go), they just have a problem with her being too powerful in the jungle.

That's correct - we're not trying to push her out of the jungle entirely with these changes, but we are looking to noticeably reduce her clear speed. Her W's damage against monsters would be significantly lower under this version, given how much health they have, , even with the buffed base damage.

Hey Meddler, this is completely off-topic but I wanted to ask...

Why does Sona's ult have a scaling mana cost, while every other support has a static 100 mana cost? Crescendo scales into 100 / 150 / 200. That's quite a lot on a champion expected to use her abilities as often as possible to get the most out of her passive and their effects on top of keeping your team mates buffed. :x Not to mention with the horrible mana regeneration on top of stale mana per level.

Can't think of a good reason off the top of the head, inclination is to standardize that to 100 like most other mana using champs with regular ults. I'll bounce the idea off the balance team, see whether we want to throw that change into the next possible patch.

You guys are really driving me away, and I doubt I'm the only one.  Basically it seems that you love the things that I hate about the game.  Nid is toxic, rage inducing, and her kit is an op mess.  You reworked her because of this and actually managed to make it worse by giving her even more mobility.  You know how you reworked Veigar because it was no fun being on the ass end of his burst?  Have you ever had fun fighting a Nid, ever?  She just chucks low mana spears all day and when she eventually lands one(quantity over quality) you're dead or you take so much in her burst that you're going b and probably blowing summoners.  I'd honestly rather fight old Veig any day of the week.  Then you actually go nerf some of the only junglers that can compete with Lee.  Are you guys not going to be happy until he's the only viable jungler?  Your obvious favoritism is just disgusting at this point, and if I didn't have so many cool friends on here I'd probably have been gone already.

If you want everything to be flashy big plays and game balance comes second, that's fine, but while you're at it just make everyone OP and reduce the death timers to nothing so we can just brawl it out :P

Have you considered focusing on making her less of a safe champion? As it stands she's extremely safe, and has a lot of sustain, both in lane and in the jungle due to her heal. Have you ever considered removing her heal entirely? She's already a champion with 1. Long range high-damage poke. 2. Powerful all-in follow up. 3. A mana-less easy to spam reliable escape. 4. A mana-less easy to spam reliable gap-closer. And 4. A potent sustain tool that also acts as an AS steroid. She's got a LOT in her kit, all of which leads to her being extremely safe champion no matter where she goes, while still having plenty of strong, reliable damage, AND mobility. Taking her sustain away could significantly help give her significantly more counter-play both in the jungle, and in lane.

Don't really know if I can have much input on this considering that as part of the balance team, you would probably know better than I would. However, I think the problem with Nidalee is mostly her safety in the jungle, being able to clear through it quickly it a large part of the problem, but she is able to sustain through it much faster and easier that a lot of other junglers currently (exception could be Fiddlesticks, maybe Olaf). She can counter-jungle very effectively, especially harassing the opposing jungler with her spears after healing up after her first couple camps, when the opposing jungler will most likely be at low HP. She's just maybe too safe in the jungle, and a little too effective. Her ganks rely on her landing her spears, so there's potential to survive her attempts with some quick feet.
 
I think that making her abilities in Cougar form have a mana cost could help to mitigate her clear speeds, or make her choose between faster clear, or the dueling potential for counter-jungling. It would make her have to make active choices in either harassing with spears, continuous ganking, clear speeds and sustain - making her unable to do all of them too effectively.
